content.text: Match ends, FC Groningen 0, Southampton 1.
Second Half ends, FC Groningen 0, Southampton 1.
Attempt missed. Jarchinio Antonia (FC Groningen) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Etiënne Reijnen following a set piece situation.
